summary: Arkingstrom Ruin: Cleared of Dwemer constructs by a band of power hungry warlocks who horde the ruin\'s treasures and secret!
descriptionHtml:
[center] [IMG]http://i1131.photobucket.com/albums/m558/clockworkcathedral/banner.jpg[/IMG] [/center]

[u][b]Update:[/u][/b]

Fixed floating bench and missing pipe
Added more furniture
Created routine for the enemies to enliven the dungeon

[i]thanks to GaidendentsuX for detailed playtesting[/i]

[u][b]Features:[/b][/u]

Custom built, Medium sized Dwemer ruin
Ready for followers (fully navmeshed)
Graphically optimised
Connected to the ‘Radiant Story’ (quests given from the outside world)
Difficult dungeon: levelled to create a challenge for any level character 
Mining opportunities for mages
Lore friendly

[u][b]The Dungeon:[/b][/u]

Though the dungeon has been cleared of Dwemer constructs this will be no easy task. The ruin has recently been overrun by a band of power hungry Warlocks who found a precious secret in its bowels. The Warlocks are  determined to protect the secret of Arkingstrom, and hoard to themselves the treasure they have found within.

[u][b]To do list:[/b][/u]

 Correct any reported errors
 Move on to the next dungeon

[u][b]Installation[/b][/u]

If you don\'t use NMM then simply place the esp into your \'data\' folder and make sure it is checked in your chosen manager.

[u][b]Compatibility[/b][/u]

This should only conflict with any mod that changes the same exterior cell. Unlikely but it could happen! 


Tools used: CK and Tesnip (for cleaning)
author: flynnmichael81
